leads.name: Stanford AI Lab

opportunities.description: Collaborate with top universities to explore new research topics in deep learning and develop effective software frameworks
Leverage structured design and deep learning frameworks to create impactful AI software solutions

action_items: Initiate contact with research leaders at University of Toronto, NYU, and Stanford to discuss collaborative opportunities
Explore potential funding or investment for new deep learning research topics
Develop and propose software projects using advanced deep learning frameworks with university research groups
Identify and support researchers like SPEAKER_01 in defining promising research topics
